DataElement.preferredName: Agent Placebo Bevacizumab Administered Last Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the last administration of bevacizumab, a monoclonal antibody that may prevent the growth of blood vessels from surrounding tissue to a solid tumor, or placebo, an inactive substance, treatment or procedure that is intended to mimic as closely as possible a therapy in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the administration of bevacizumab, a monoclonal antibody that may prevent the growth of blood vessels from surrounding tissue to a solid tumor, or placebo, an inactive substance, treatment or procedure that is intended to mimic as closely as possible a therapy in a clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: An inactive substance, treatment or procedure that is intended to mimic as closely as possible a therapy in a clinical trial.:A monoclonal antibody that may prevent the growth of blood vessels from surrounding tissue to a solid tumor.:Given.

Concepts.definition: An inactive substance, treatment or procedure that is intended to provide baseline measurements for the experimental protocol of a clinical trial.

A recombinant humanized monoclonal antibody directed against the vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF), a pro-angiogenic cytokine.  Bevacizumab binds to VEGF and inhibits VEGF receptor binding, thereby preventing the growth and maintenance of tumor blood vessels.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the last date of an evaluation, assessment, or treatment.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
